title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1805.1 - Contemplated programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1805.1 - Contemplated programs

State Regulations

The municipality or agency thereof, as the case may be, shall notify the commissioner of any contemplated urban renewal, community
renewal or concentrated code enforcement program during the early stage of the
preparation of an application for federal or State assistance, as the case may
be. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1805.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
